title: QueryMsg
description: Query message types for the contract. Note: the webassembly virtual machine is 32 bits so indexes are specified as u32 values.

oneOf.description: Gets the address list from the contract. Items are returned in order of their priority. Items with higher priorities are returned first. Returns Vec<AddressItem>.
Gets the admin of the contract. Returns Addr.
Gets the number of addresses in the contract. Returns usize (u32 in webassembly).
